text: Volta Redonda is an Brazilian city in the state of Rio de Janeiro. 273,988 people lived here in 2020 and its area is 182.81 km². Its name means 'Round Turn' in Portuguese. The largest steel company Companhia Siderúrgica Nacional (CSN) is in Volta Redonda. Category:Cities in Rio de Janeiro (state)
title: Volta Redonda
